summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "• 1 Jade Lotus | Shock-Quelling Powder
![Mirage Pill .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a2/Mirage_Pill_.jpg)| Mirage Pill | Epic | Upon use, instantly gains a considerable amount of Might | • Purchase from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after finishing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind RidgeFound in Pagoda Realm in The New West| Not craftable | Mirage Pill"
        - Following Text: "• Purchase from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after finishing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge| Not craftable | Enhanced Tiger Subduing Pellets
![Longevity Decoction .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3f/Longevity_Decoction_.jpg)| Longevity Decoction | Rare | Upon use, considerably increases maximum health for a long duration | • Formula bought from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after finishing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind RidgeBought from the Shrine Store in The New West| Not craftable | Longevity Decoction"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts the **Mirage Pill**, an epic item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. When used, it instantly grants a significant boost to Might. The item can be purchased from **Xu Dog** in the **Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar** after completing **Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge** or found in the **Pagoda Realm in The New West**. It is not craftable.
